tasks.title: Implement Authentication
tasks.description: Set up JWT authentication for the Task Management API. Ensure users can log in and obtain a token to access protected routes.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Create a relational database schema for storing user details and their respective tasks. Consider scalability and normalization.

tasks.title: Write API Documentation
tasks.description: Document all the available endpoints, their request format, and their responses. Use tools like Postman or Swagger.

tasks.title: Set up Continuous Integration
tasks.description: Use GitHub Actions or Jenkins to set up a CI/CD pipeline. Automate testing and deployment processes.

tasks.title: Frontend UI/UX Design
tasks.description: Design a responsive and user-friendly interface for the task management application. Ensure compatibility across all devices.

tasks.title: Implement Search Feature
tasks.description: Users should be able to search for tasks using keywords. Use algorithms that can handle fuzzy searching.

tasks.title: Optimize Server Performance
tasks.description: Profile the server to identify bottlenecks. Optimize database queries and ensure the server can handle high traffic.
